titleStmt.title: Several sermons preach'd on the whole eighth chapter of the Epistle to the Romans eighteen of which preach'd on the first, second, third, fourth verses are here published : wherein the saints exemption from condemnation, the mystical union, the spiritual life, the dominion of sin and the spirits agency in freeing from it, the law's inability to justifie and save, Christ's mission, eternal sonship, incarnation, his being an expiatory sacrifice, fulfilling the laws righteousness (which is imputed to believers) are opened, confirmed, vindicated, and applied / by Tho. Jacomb.
titleStmt.author: Jacombe, Thomas, 1622-1687.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Godbid and are to be sold by M. Pitt, and R. Chiswell, and J. Robinson,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
